name: Top Run: Retro Pixel Adventure
description:
Top Run was developed by a family of two people who adores 80s and wanted to create a fun game for adults who are nostalgic about 1980s and a game for kids who love addictive and challenging action.

The game is free with ads, there is no way someone can pay to win in this game, everything is completely fair. If you’d like to support us, you can buy a full game that will unlock everything for you and give you additional playable retro pixel arcade! A game within a game! Yay!

If you enjoyed Top Run please rate it and leave an honest review.
